remarks: The derivative of ` O ` is bounded on the given interval.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem80.f $e |- ( ph -> F : RR --> RR ) $.

fourierdlem80.relioo $e |- ( ( ( ph /\ r e. ( A [,] B ) ) /\ -. r e. ran S ) -> E. k e. ( 0 ..^ N ) r e. ( ( S ` k ) (,) ( S ` ( k + 1 ) ) ) ) $.
fdv $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ) -> ( RR _D ( F |` I ) ) : I --> RR ) $.
fourierdlem80.y $e |- Y = ( s e. ( ( S ` j ) (,) ( S ` ( j + 1 ) ) ) |-> ( ( ( F ` ( X + s ) ) - C ) / ( 2 x. ( sin ` ( s / 2 ) ) ) ) ) $.
fourierdlem80.ch $e |- ( ch <-> ( ( ( ( ( ph /\ j e. ( 0 ..^ N ) ) /\ w e. RR ) /\ z e. RR ) /\ A. t e. I ( abs ` ( F ` t ) ) <_ w ) /\ A. t e. I ( abs ` ( ( RR _D ( F |` I ) ) ` t ) ) <_ z ) ) $.
fourierdlem80 $p |- ( ph -> E. b e. RR A. s e. dom ( RR _D O ) ( abs ` ( ( RR _D O ) ` s ) ) <_ b ) $.
